Email_1.Subject: Your Simulation Run
Email_1.Body:
Great job! You got an impressive score on your
    simulation run.
            
    Next, you are going to perform a real Pipeline
    Extraction. We suspect that their is a person
    in possession of illegal items and it will be
    your job to find them.
            
    Good luck, I know you will do fine.

Email_2.Subject: Great Score
Email_2.Body:
Great score newbie! Remember to be really
    attentive when looking at the suspects
    desktop.
